sentences.en: He felt too shocked to move. His world had been turned upside down.
sentences.cn: 他惊呆了。他的世界已经完全被打乱了。

sentences.en: His eyes were open and everything he saw was upside down.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛睁开了，看到的一切都是颠倒的。

sentences.en: I can't read it if it's upside - down.
sentences.cn: 若把它上下翻转过来,我便看不懂了.

sentences.en: If you turn the envelope upside down, the key will fall out.
sentences.cn: 你如果把信封倒过来, 钥匙就会掉出.

sentences.en: Officials hung the flag upside down. You could have cut the atmosphere with a knife.
sentences.cn: 官员们把旗子挂倒了。气氛紧张得让人透不过气来。

sentences.en: Salter held the bag by the corners and shook it upside down.
sentences.cn: 索尔特捏住包的外角，把它倒过来晃了晃。

sentences.en: The burglars turned the flat upside down.
sentences.cn: 窃贼把这个单元房翻得一片狼藉.

sentences.en: The canoe floated upside down on the lake.
sentences.cn: 独木舟底朝天漂浮在湖面上。

sentences.en: The children hung the picture upside down.
The divorce turned his whole world upside down.
sentences.cn: 离婚把他的一切都搞得颠三倒四.

sentences.en: The lid, turned upside down, served as a coffee table.
sentences.cn: 那个盖子被翻过来当作咖啡桌。

sentences.en: The painting was hung upside down.
The upside of the whole thing is that we got a free trip to Jamaica.
sentences.cn: 整个事情的好处是我们得到一次免费去牙买加的机会。

sentences.en: They left the room upside - down.
sentences.cn: 他们把房间弄得乱七八糟.

sentences.en: Turning his trousers upside down, she shook out a lot of coins.
sentences.cn: 她倒提着他的裤子, 抖出了许多硬币.

trans.tran_cn: 好处，上边，（糟糕局面的）好的一面，颠倒着
